title: Miller Family Reunion
question_text:
The stemplot below displays the ages of the family members at the Miller family reunion.
Describe the shape of the distribution of ages.

choices.text: The Millers' ages are unimodal and skewed right.
The Miller's ages are bimodal and symmetric.
The Millers' ages are unimodal and skewed left.
The Millers' ages are uniformly distributed.
A stemplot cannot be used to determine the shape of a distribution.
